org.samo_lego.simpleauth.utils

Interface PlayerAuth

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MixinPlayerEntity

    public interface PlayerAuth
    PLayer authentication extension.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canSkipAuth()
      Checks whether player is a fake player (from CarpetMod).
      net.minecraft.text.Text getAuthMessage()
      Gets the text which tells the player to login or register, depending on account status.
      java.lang.String getFakeUuid()
      Converts player uuid, to ensure player with "nAmE" and "NamE" get same uuid.
      void hidePosition(boolean hide)
      Teleports player to spawn or last location that is recorded.
      boolean isAuthenticated()
      Checks whether player is authenticated.
      void setAuthenticated(boolean authenticated)
      Sets the authentication status of the player.

    • Method Detail

      • hidePosition

        void hidePosition(boolean hide)
        Teleports player to spawn or last location that is recorded. Last location means the location before de-authentication.
        Parameters:
        hide - whether to teleport player to spawn (provided in config) or last recorded position
        See Also:
        See implementation

      • getFakeUuid

        java.lang.String getFakeUuid()
        Converts player uuid, to ensure player with "nAmE" and "NamE" get same uuid. Both players are not allowed to play, since mod mimics Mojang behaviour. of not allowing accounts with same names but different capitalization.
        Returns:
        converted UUID as string
        See Also:
        See implementation

      • setAuthenticated

        void setAuthenticated(boolean authenticated)
        Sets the authentication status of the player.
        Parameters:
        authenticated - whether player should be authenticated
        See Also:
        See implementation

      • isAuthenticated

        boolean isAuthenticated()
        Checks whether player is authenticated.
        Returns:
        false if player is not authenticated, otherwise true.
        See Also:
        See implementation

      • getAuthMessage

        net.minecraft.text.Text getAuthMessage()
        Gets the text which tells the player to login or register, depending on account status.
        Returns:
        LiteralText with appropriate string (login or register)
        See Also:
        See implementation

      • canSkipAuth

        boolean canSkipAuth()
        Checks whether player is a fake player (from CarpetMod).
        Returns:
        true if player is fake (can skip authentication process), otherwise false
        See Also:
        See implementation
